metadata.name: CVS Pharmacy Enamel Guard 15 mg 100mL Solution concentrate

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For sequential use with sodium thiosulfate for the treatment of acute cyanide poisoning that is judged to be life threatening FDA Label

contraindications.disease: Oral LD50 of 157 9mg kg observed in rats and 175mg kg observed in mice MSDS Estimated oral LD50 of 35mg kg in humans A19440 Sodium nitrite toxicity manifests as cardiovascular collapse following severe hypotension due to nitrite s vasodilatory action
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Sodium nitrite reverses cyanide toxicity and produces blood vessel dilation A19440

incompatibilities.description: The risk or severity of orthostatic hypotension and syncope can be increased when Nitrous acid is combined with Duloxetine
The risk or severity of hypotension and orthostatic hypotension can be increased when Nitrous acid is combined with Levodopa
